mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.owner, a.bank_id, a.owner_type, a.no bank_no, a.used, a.mobile, a.province, a.city, a.branch, a.created,
b.`realname` owner_name, b.`identity` owner_identity, b.`mobile` owner_phone
b.`name` owner_name, b.`identity` owner_identity, b.`telephone` owner_phone
FROM (SELECT * FROM bank_card WHERE owner_type=#{ownerType}) a LEFT JOIN
`user_security` b ON a.`owner`=b.`uid`
`company` b ON a.`owner`=b.`id`
) c
`id`=#{id}
AND `owner`=#{owner}
AND `city` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{city}),'%')
AND `branch` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{branch}),'%')
AND `bank_no` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{bankNo}),'%')
AND `mobile` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{mobile}),'%')
AND `province` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{province}),'%')
AND `owner_name` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{ownerName}),'%')
AND `created`<=#{timeStop}
AND `created`>=#{timeStart}
